runs.comm: hits the seam and swings away from Ryder, who tries to steer that toward third man but doesn't connect
this time it stayed a touch low after pitching on a length, Ryder wanted to swipe it to midwicket, inside edge onto his pads
length ball on offstump this time, Ryder played with soft hands towards the offside and the batsmen scamper a single
good ball from Zaheer, short of a length and on middle, Brendon goes on the backfoot and defends
that one sails down the leg side, and that's a wide
much better this time from Zaheer, length ball about a foot outside off, Brendon steers it to point and screams "Wait on" to his partner
Brendon walks across the stumps, Zaheer sees him and bowls it wider outside off, it climbs from a back of a length, and the batsman is beaten

but not as great as Ishant's first ball, he gets Ryder lbw, that was on a length, Ryder tries to flick it off his pads, misses and is struck in front of leg and middle, Hawkeye says that was pitching outside leg, Ryder's unlucky there

stunning ball from Ishant, jagged back viciously from outside off, Guptill bravely decides to not offer a shot is struck outside off, but that was going on to hit the stumps, Guptill is a very luck man to still be there, Ishant can't believe it
no ball this time, good length outside off, let go by Guptill
that was short and outside off, Guptill is a great puller but he didn't get anywhere near the ball this time, wasted free-hit
mistimes it towards point this time, no run again
Guptill goes for a wild heave from outside off, is beaten and the ball sails through to the keeper
goes for the cut, gets a bottom edge which takes the ball towards third man for a single
Zaheer keeps it on target, back of a length on middle, Guptill plays it off the backfoot towards point
Guptill wants to steer that from outside off to third man but is beaten by the away movement
Guptill is having a horrendous time here, back of a length ball, angling across the stumps, Guptill wanted to pull that one but it stayed lower than he expected and it goes through to the keeper
this time Guptill mistimes it back to the bowler
that will make Guptill feel a lot better, it was in the slot and Guptill clobbers it to the wide long-on boundary for a boundary
cramping the batsman for room this time, Guptill manages to work it towards short midwicket
Guptill opens the face of the bat and steers it towards third man
no-ball, McCullum charges down the trac, Ishant bangs it in short, the batsman gets a bottom edge towards the bowler
big no-ball from Ishant this time, a slower yorker on middle, McCullum gets off the mark by hitting it past the bowler
Guptill backs away and smashes that over mid-off for a four
Shot! massive six from Guptill, picks the ball up from a length and deposits it miles into the crowd at midwicket, this is much better from New Zealand
wide outside off, Guptill chases after it but doesn't get hold of the ball
slightly overpitched, just outside off, firmly punched to mid-off, "Wait" is the cry from Guptill
slower ball, 116kmph, sliding onto the pads, Guptill nudges it towards short midwicket for a single to retain strike
back of a length, angling across the batsman,Guptill shuffles across the stumps and pulls that just over the man at short fine leg
wide outside off, glides it down to third man for a single
slower, full ball on off, 125kmph, Brendon shuffles across the stumps and nudges it to square leg, he runs the first run hard to give himself time to come back for the second
full on middle this time, bunted towards mid-off for a single
Guptill goes for a cheeky pull, gets a top-edge on it, still enough on it to take it past Irfan Pathan at square leg, Irfan chases after the ball but the ball wins the race
wide outside off, slapped to point, straight to the fielder, no run
strays onto the pads, glancing fine for a boundary, easy runs for McCullum
quicker full ball on middle and off this time, McCullum gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
lovely shot from Guptill, length ball from Irfan, Guptill stands still and swats it powerfully to the square leg boundary, that sails into a giant advertising hoarding well beyond the boundary
another biggie from Guptill, he backs away to give himself room, and clobbers him straigjht down the ground, that was very, very high but carried long enough
good ball from Irfan, full on middle, Guptill can only defend it back to the bowler
low full toss, pushed towards mid-off for a single, again Guptill keeps the strike
starts off with a ball down the legside, swept firmly for a single
flighted this time, on middle and off, nudged towards midwicket
tossed up again, full outside off, prodded towards point
Guptill's gone lbw, Harbhajan drops it a touch short, Guptill gets on the backfoot and tries to play across the line, he misses and the ball strikes his pad in front of middle and leg
length ball on off, turned to midwicket, straight to the fielder, no run
excellent first over from Harbhajan, only two runs from it, finishes off by holding the length a bit, on middle and leg, Taylor taps it back to the bowler off the backfoot
McCullum was looking to work it past midwicket, gets a leading edge towards mid-off
wide down the legside
a wild heave from McCullum, doesn't get bat on ball though
McCullum is a bit early on his off-drive, it flies dangerously close to the bowler, who makes a valiant dive to his left but can't reach the ball
driven towards mid-on for a single
strange shot from McCullum, the ball was well of offstump, McCullum wanted to club it to midwicket anyway, again he doesn't connect
uses his feet, drives the ball towards long-on for a single
overpitched on legstump, defended back to the bowler
nicely in the slot for McCullum, length ball outside off, McCullum crashes that over cover for his first six
sensibly worked down to long-on
overpitched on middle and leg, dug out to short midwicket for a single
way down the legside, hits McCullum's pad though
well bowled by Harbhajan, McCullum was charging down the track, Harbhajan fired it in wide of offstump, McCullum chops it towards point
starts with a back of a length ball on off, McCullum gets a big stride in as he pushes the ball towards mid-off
steered wide of the cover fielder this time for a single
short of length again, outside off, McCullum opens the face and glides it towards third man for a single

slower, full ball from Ishant, squeezed towards Suresh Raina at point, there was a chance of a run-out as Taylor had charged down the ground though McCullum wasn't interested, Raina's throw is wide though
poked towards backward point for the fifth single in a row
defended towards cover, first dot ball of the over, only five runs off it
starts with a full ball on middle, defended back to the bowler
defended off the backfoot towards cover, batsman hare through for a single
Taylor was looking to dispatch that to cow corner, but doesn't get bat on ball
Shot! slower ball from Irfan, wide outside off, Taylor walks into it and carves that over extra cover for a huge six
swung towards extra cover, along the ground this time
back of a length, not much room for McCullum to work with, he cuts it towards point anyway
Yusuf fires it into legstump, McCullum pushes it towards square leg for a single
sixes are easy at this ground, Yusuf slides it down leg, Taylor helps it along over the fine-leg boundary
Massive! another poor ball from Yusuf, full toss at a nice, hittable height, Taylor murders that one, swung over midwicket
a wild swat from Taylor this time, not where he intended it to go but it races away to the square leg boundary
wants another big hit, but gets it on the bottom of the bat and the ball dribbles back to the bowler
dug out towards midwicket for a single
full on legstump, turned to fine leg for a single
turned off the backfoot towards square leg for a single
driven firmly down the ground towards long-on
full toss on legstump, strangely McCullum decides to not send it into orbit, pushes it towards midwicket, no run
more leg-stump offerings, worked to square leg this time
another single, down to long-off, to end the over, sensible stuff from New Zealand, with plenty of batting to come they have this match under control
good ball to start, back of a length on leg, tapped back to the bowler
Taylor's bowled, he had walked across the stumps giving Zaheer a sight of the legstump, the bowler targets it and hits the base of legstump
reverts to the back-of-length that has served him so well today, Oram blocks it back to the bowler
drives it down to mid-off this time to get off the mark
McCullum walks down the track early, Zaheer shortens his length a touch, bowls it slower as well, McCullum plays it to midwicket
goes for the paddle sweep, to a ball well outside off, doesn't connect with the ball, which goes through to the keeper
bowled flat through the air outside off, Oram gets beaten by the angle across the left-hander
pushed towards deep backward square leg for a single
McCullum moves towards the of and swings the ball towards long leg
McCullum tries to sweep but doesn't make contact, the ball runs fine towards the third man boundary, the fielder just pulls it in
that's cleared the boundary even though he hit it with the bottom! McCullum charges and lofts Yuvraj over the straight boundary
loud appeal for lbw but the umpire says there's some bat on it, they run a single behind square
Oram comes down the track but gets beaten in the flight, he swipes and gets an edge over the head of short third man, that's gone for four too, 17 off the over
tries to swipe an outside off ball, bottom edges it to the offside
attempts a booming drive, is beaten, well collected by Dhoni, who is standing up to the stumps
nicely done by McCullum, slower ball from Irfan, McCullum plays it inside-out over extra cover, not much power behind that shot but it races away to the boundary
looks to play a cheeky paddle-sweep, is beaten again
driven to deep midwicket, batsmen think about taking two but settle for one
lovely shot from Oram to end the over, he lofts Irfan dead straight down the ground, it crashes into the advertising hoarding
gives himself room to work the ball towards extra cover
pushed towards long-on this time, another single
Oram says he's had enough of the singles and tries to loft Harbhajan over the sightscreen, he's beaten
works a full ball on legstump wide of the fielder at midwicket, gives time for the batsmen to take two
full and outside off, Oram goes for the cover drive but gets the toe end of the bat and the ball dribbles to the offside
that was quick from Harbhajan, 109kmph, full and on offstump, tapped back to the bowler by Oram, good over from Harbhajan
McCullum opens the face and steers it wide of third man, the batsmen get two, then there's an overthrow, giving New Zealand an extra run, not often that there are threes taken on this ground
slower ball from Ishant, Oram waits on it and plays it uppishly over cover after clearing the front leg, the placement is fantastic, bisects the two fielders at the boundary
Oram tries to swipe it through midwicket, gets beaten, there's been a few of those from the New Zealand batsmen this innings
similar shot from Oram, gets hold of it this time, and the ball flies wide of long-on, one bounce and into the boundary
yorker outside off, dug out towards point, single
back of a length, on middle and off, McCullum backs away and pokes it towards cover, gets a single
he gets a warm welcome from McCullum, down the track and launches that over long-on for a huge six, brings up his half-century as well
this time it's an inside-edge towards square leg, batsmen run hard to take two
uses his feet, gets a bottom-edge and Dhoni has to dive to his right to collect that one
backs away and carves it through the covers
glorious shot from Oram to finish things off for New Zealand, gets under a length ball from Yusuf, and clears the cover boundary with ease, that was all timing
